metadata.title: CVE-2016-10396 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The racoon daemon in IPsec-Tools 0.8.2 contains a remotely exploitablecomputational-complexity attack when parsing and storing ISAKMP fragments.The implementation permits a remote attacker to exhaust computationalresources on the remote endpoint by repeatedly sending ISAKMP fragmentpackets in a particular order such that the worst-case computationalcomplexity is realized in the algorithm utilized to determine if reassemblyof the fragments can take place.

criterions.comment: ipsec-tools package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
